title: 50 MB daily
info: 50 MB of Internet for 1 day at the price of 5 Afghani. Only for social networks. Press the green button to activate and the red button to deactivate. Dial *344*511# to activate.

title: 170 MB weekly
info: 170 MB of Internet for 7 days at the price of 18 Afghanis. Only for social networks. Press the green button to activate and the red button to deactivate. Dial *344*512# to activate.

title: 475 MB per month
info: 475 MB Internet for 30 days at the price of 50 Afghanis. Only for social networks. Press the green button to activate and the red button to deactivate. Dial *344*513# to activate.
